General.name: help
General.desc: Helps you with things, does helpful things, lists things maybe??? Just a helpful pal.

General.name: prefix
General.desc: Gets or sets the server's prefix

General.name: get
General.desc: Sends a page with details about a clan

General.name: list
General.desc: A list of all clans in a server

General.name: join
General.desc: Joins a clan if it's public

General.name: invite
General.desc: Invites a user to a clan

Management.name: set
Management.desc: Sets an attribute in a clan

Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.desc: Bans a user from a clan

Moderation.name: unban
Moderation.desc: Unbans a user from a clan

Moderation.name: kick
Moderation.desc: Kicks a user from a clan

Economy.name: withdraw
Economy.desc: Removes pearls from a clan YOU OWN

Economy.name: slots
Economy.desc: A slot machine that can multiply your bet by up to 10x

Economy.name: uslots
Economy.desc: The ultimate slot machine that can multiply your bet by up to x1000 but winning it is extremely rare

Economy.name: leaderboard
Economy.desc: Shows the top earnings for the server's clans and users

Economy.name: shop
Economy.desc: Sends the shop page for the server

Administrator.name: export
Administrator.desc: Sends a JSON file with all clans in a server

Administrator.name: import
Administrator.desc: Replaces all clans in a server with those from a JSON file

Administrator.name: listall
Administrator.desc: Gets a list of all clans including unlisted ones

Administrator.name: gold
Administrator.desc: Sets a clan's gold status (gold gives 50-500 more pearls if user is in the clan)
